snippet.title: Borderlands 4 - Nintendo Switch 2 Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct
snippet.description:
The next Borderlands game, Borderlands 4 will launch on Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025 so get ready to loot your way through the open world.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
